questions.question_text: Satsangah sthāpitas-tasmād divyo’yam ________ । Swāminārāyaṇeneha sākṣhād evā’vatīrya cha ॥ 6 ॥
questions.explanation: This is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 6. The word 'parabrahmaṇā' is missing.

questions.question_text: ‘Satsang-Dīkṣhā’ e nāmnu shāstra rachavāmā āve chhe.
questions.explanation: This line is the Gujarati translation from Satsang Diksha Shlok 7.

questions.question_text: Satya evā ātmāno sang karavo, satya evā Paramātmāno sang karavo, satya evā ________ sang karavo ane sachchhāstrano sang karavo e satsangnu sāchu lakṣhaṇ jāṇavu.
questions.explanation: This is a line from the translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 8-9. The word 'guruno' is missing.

questions.question_text: “Ane satsangī paṇ ene ja kahīe; kem je, satyarūp evo je potāno ātmā tathā satyarūp evā je Bhagwān teno jene āvī rīte sang thayo tene satsangī kahīe.”
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Gadhada I-39.

questions.question_text: “Trīs lakṣhaṇe yukta evā je sant teno je sang te man-karma-vachane rākhe, to jeṭalā ________ arthe sādhan chhe teṭalā sarve tenā sangmā āvī jāy chhe.”
questions.explanation: This is a line from Vachanamrut Vartal-4. The word 'kalyāṇne' is missing.

questions.question_text: Sācho maḷyo chhe satsang, ange achaḷ karī rākhjo re;
questions.explanation: This line is from Chosath Padi.

questions.question_text: Tethī Parabrahma Swāminārāyaṇe ā lokmā sākṣhāt avatarīne ā divya ________ sthāpanā karī.
questions.explanation: This is the Gujarati translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 6. The word 'satsangnī' is missing.

questions.question_text: Ā satsangnu gnān mumukṣhuone thāya evā shubh āshayathī ‘Satsang-Dīkṣhā’ e nāmnu shāstra rachavāmā āve chhe.
questions.explanation: This line is from the Gujarati translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 7.

questions.question_text: Āvo divya satsang karanār ________ sukhī thāy chhe.
questions.explanation: This is a line from the translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 8-9. The word 'manuṣhya' is missing.

questions.question_text: Rakhe chaḍe bījāno rang, evu ḍahāpaṇ dūr nākhjo re… ṭek
questions.explanation: This line is from Chosath Padi.
